pageContext.claim: “We're looking at putting in a very major tax cut for middle-income people. And if we do that it will be sometime just prior, I would say, to November. … And I would say sometime around the first of November, maybe a little before that.”
pageContext.analysis: This is transparently false and reeks of electioneering. Congress was not in session when Trump promised this tax cut weeks before the midterm elections and would not be back until well past the first of November.
